articles.description: The would-be lovebirds at the heart of Bridgerton Season 2 are both looking a bit overheated, in a new teaser released by Netflix on Monday. The recently unmasked (for us, at least) Lady Whistledown, meanwhile, can be heard taking a certain glee in “sharpenin…

articles.author: Rasha Ali, USA TODAY
articles.title: Mary J. Blige wows audiences with bedazzled bodysuit during Super Bowl halftime performance - USA TODAY
articles.description: Mary J. Blige hit the stage at the Super Bowl halftime show in a bedazzled bodysuit and thigh-high boots to match that blinded viewers with bling.
articles.content:
Mary J. Blige did not come to play at Sunday's Super Bowl halftime show.

articles.author: Lily Kuo
articles.title: China censors Friends, removing references to LGBTQ and sex - The Washington Post
articles.description: In the new streaming version of the popular show in China, Ross's ex-wife is no longer a lesbian, and multiple orgasms become gossiping.
articles.content: In other cases, the Chinese subtitles differed from the English-language dialogue. When Joey recommends that a lovelorn Ross, recently left by his wife, go to a strip joint, his advice is translated … [+3220 chars]
